summary.span: 为派生自 的控件提供设计时支持的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for design-time support for controls that derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展类如果你想要创建设计器中的为Web 服务器控件或扩展的类的。Extend the class if you want to create a designer for the Web server control or for a class that extends .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法注销从所有数据源事件的设计器的事件处理程序。The method unregisters the designer's event handlers from all data source events.

summary.span: 如果无法通过 或 属性创建示例数据，则获取虚拟示例数据，以便在设计图面上呈现数据绑定控件。

span.span: Gets dummy sample data to render the data-bound control on the design surface if sample data cannot be created from the or properties.

summary.span: 由设计器重写，以便用设计器实现的属性隐藏数据绑定控件的对应运行时属性。

span.span: Overridden by the designer to shadow run-time properties of the data-bound control with corresponding properties implemented by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法来执行在基础数据绑定控件的数据源更改时所需的其他任何操作。Override the method to perform any additional actions required when the data source of the underlying data-bound control changes.

span.para: 如果你重写方法，调用基实现之前执行其他处理。
If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

summary.span: 获取数据绑定控件显示在设计图面上的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.

value.span: 数据绑定控件显示在设计图面上的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface.

span.para: 若要更改的数据绑定控件在设计图面显示的行数，请重写属性以返回想显示的行数。
To change the number of rows that the data-bound control displays on the design surface, override the property to return the number of rows that you want displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否在其操作列表中包括“选择一个数据源”。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should include "Choose a data source" in its action list.

span.para: 你可能想要重写此属性以提供一个对话框以选择数据源控件或禁止用户更改与数据绑定控件关联的数据源控件。
You may want to override this property to provide a dialog box to select a data source control or to disable the user from changing the data source control associated with the data-bound control.
